premises: If the interest rate rises, then investment will decrease
If the interest rate rises, then consumer spending will fall
Investment will not decrease or consumer spending will not fall
conclusions: The interest rate will not rise
Investment will not decrease and consumer spending will not fall
If the interest rate rises, then investment will decrease and consumer spending will fall
incorrect conclusions: If the interest rate rises, then investment will decrease and consumer spending will not fall
If investment decreases and consumer spending falls, then the interest rate will rise
If investment decreases, then the interest rate will rise
Investment will decrease or consumer spending will fall but not both are true
If the interest rate does not rise, then investment will not decrease or consumer spending will not fall
